description: A friend and fellow classmate to Naeka. A boyish, short-haired and more rational member of the kendo club, Miwa is a decently performing student. Though she sometimes comes off as insensitive to her friend, she doesn`t deny Naeka`s skilful swordsmanship and determination. She works with Eiko at the maid cafe "D`erlanger", that holds a rivalry with a neighbouring shop.
name: Hirano Miwa
